thread.section_title: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit | electric-bike-kit.com
thread.title: william
thread.title_full: Clean Republic Hill Topper Electric Bike Kit reviewed by william

author: william
title: william
text:
We purchased one hilltop or 12 mile kit. Within a week of installing it on Lori's bike, I purchased another 12 mile Kit .
We also tested them for distance, in our neighborhood, they will indeed carry you approximately 12 miles on flat ground as advertised. We also went biking on nature trails in the woods and Got approximately 8+ miles. I plan to buy two extra batteries so we can go further on bike rides.
This product works exactly as advertised no regrets! !!
